level.heading: Misdemeanor insurance fraud.
level.text: A person commits the offense of misdemeanor insurance fraud if that person knowingly engages in conduct specified in ยง 22-3225.02 with the intent to defraud or to fraudulently obtain property of another.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 16-144, see notes following ยง 22-3225.02.
